definition: lit. the cart in front overturns, a warning to the following cart (idiom); fig. draw lesson from the failure of one's predecessor/learn from past mistake/once bitten twice shy
pinyin: qian2 che1 zhi1 fu4 , hou4 che1 zhi1 jian4

definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
